subject: Labor and Jobs
Lockouts
Basketball
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: If the N.B.A. and its players can agree on a new labor deal this weekend, a 66-game season could open on Christmas Day. If talks fail, the season appears in jeopardy.
snippet: If the N.B.A. and its players can agree on a new labor deal this weekend, a 66-game season could open on Christmas Day. If talks fail, the season appears in jeopardy.
